nodes.text: Matthew "Matt" Lanter (born April 1, 1983) is an American actor who has provided the voice of Anakin Skywalker for Star Wars: The Clone Wars, Star Wars Rebels, and Star Wars: Forces of Destiny. He also portrayed Davan in the Disney+ live-action TV series The Mandalorian.
